str:Codelist.com:Name: Banknote & coin related items code list

str:Code.com:Name: Number of ATM with a withdrawal function for euro banknotes (excluding devices with cash-depositing functionalities)
Number of branches of Credit Institutions - Number of Credit Institutions and their branches providing cash services
Number of NCBs Branches - providing cash services
Collector coins - Collector coins issued less collector coins returned; not intended for circulation; (net issuance)
Issued - number of banknotes/coins put into circulation
Logistical stock - banknotes held by the NCB; Eurosystem Strategic Reserve Stocks (ESS) not included (derived by aggregation of new and reissuable Logistical stocks, held to order and in transit)
Net Circulation - number of banknotes/coins in circulation (for banknotes it has to be calculated, and equals created notes less destroyed notes less stocks of the NCB)
NCB stock - NCB own coin stocks, physically held by reporting NCB
Returned - number of banknotes/coins returned from circulation
Sorted - number of banknotes/coins processed to check the authenticity and fitness
Sorted to unfit - number of banknotes processed and sorted to unfit
Surplus - number of banknotes/coins which exceeds the maximum level of logical stocks at national level
